Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-1085 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.35.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-1085 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.35.1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.35.1-5, affected by CVE-2024-1085
